sentences.sContent: ...the asymmetry of Van de Velde's designs of this period.
sentences.sCn: ...这一时期范•德•费尔德设计作品的不对称性。

remMethod.val: a(不) + symmetry(对称， 匀称) → 不对称

words.tran: [数] 非对称的（等于asymmetric）；不均匀的；不匀称的

trans.tranOther: Asymmetry is the appearance that something has when its two sides or halves are different in shape, size, or style
